mapper.sql: id, intime, goodid, goodnumber, suppliers, linkman, phone, operatorid, comments,inrepositoryid
mapper.insert:
insert into inrepository
id,
intime,
goodid,
goodnumber,
suppliers,
linkman,
phone,
operatorid,
comments,
inrepositoryid,

mapper.update:
update inrepository
intime = #{intime,jdbcType=DATE},
goodid = #{goodid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goodnumber = #{goodnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
suppliers = #{suppliers,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
linkman = #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operatorid = #{operatorid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
comments = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{inrepositoryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update inrepository set intime = #{intime,jdbcType=DATE}, goodid = #{goodid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goodnumber = #{goodnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, suppliers = #{suppliers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, linkman = #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operatorid = #{operatorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comments = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inrepositoryid = #{inrepositoryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select goods.goodname, goods.goodunit, goods.goodtype, inrepository.goodnumber from goods,inrepository WHERE goods.id = inrepository.goodid AND inrepository.inrepositoryid = #{inrepositoryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select distinct inrepository.inrepositoryid, inrepository.suppliers, inrepository.linkman, inrepository.phone, inrepository.intime, staff.staffname from inrepository,staff WHERE inrepository.operatorid=staff.id GROUP BY inrepositoryid

select distinct inrepository.inrepositoryid, inrepository.suppliers, inrepository.linkman, inrepository.phone, inrepository.intime, staff.staffname from inrepository,staff WHERE inrepository.operatorid=staff.id AND inrepositoryid = #{inrepositoryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select distinct inrepositoryid, suppliers, linkman, phone, operatorid, intime from inrepository GROUP BY inrepositoryid limit #{page},3
select COUNT(*) from (select inrepositoryid from inrepository GROUP BY inrepositoryid)AS repository
